A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It was ok and had some throwback to the originals but not enough saber fighting and Luke’s death was unnecessary and sad. Luke deserved better. Johnson took a dump on the OT. If you were expecting to relive your childhood than forget it. Should have allowed Lucas to help and give more insight....good riddance to the new cast after 9 and younger audience it’s trying to reel in...
